Source.Name: firefox
Source.Description: It is more secure and faster to browse the web with Firefox web browser. You can personalize your web browser with many specifications that is not enough to explain in two sentences.

Update.Comment: Fix bookmark copying in postinstall, check if the file exists.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Bump to latest security release to fix several security issues, #15557: * XSS hazard in multiple character encodings * Location bar SSL spoofing using network error page * Incomplete fix for CVE-2010-0179 * Integer overflow vulnerability in NewIdArray * Use-after-free error with nsDOMAttribute MutationObserver * Java security bypass from LiveConnect loaded via data: URL meta refresh * Add support for OTS font sanitizer * Crash and remote code execution using HTML tags inside a XUL tree * Chrome privilege escalation with window.open and isindex element * Buffer overflow while line breaking after document.write with long string * Miscellaneous memory safety hazards
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Bump to latest security release to fix CVE-2010-3765: * Interleaving document.write and appendChild can lead to duplicate text frames and overrunning of text run buffers.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: - Version bump to new release and disable color profile support #14496 * MFSA 2010-72 Insecure Diffie-Hellman key exchange * MFSA 2010-71 Unsafe library loading vulnerabilities * MFSA 2010-70 SSL wildcard certificate matching IP addresses * MFSA 2010-69 Cross-site information disclosure via modal calls * MFSA 2010-68 XSS in gopher parser when parsing hrefs * MFSA 2010-67 Dangling pointer vulnerability in LookupGetterOrSetter * MFSA 2010-66 Use-after-free error in nsBarProp * MFSA 2010-65 Buffer overflow and memory corruption using document.write * MFSA 2010-64 Miscellaneous memory safety hazards
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: - Version bump to new release: * Introduced support for the X-FRAME-OPTIONS HTTP response header. Site owners can use this to mitigate clickjacking attacks by ensuring that their content is not embedded into other sites. * Fixed several security issues. * Fixed several stability issues.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: - Version bump to new release: * Dangling pointer crash regression from plugin parameter array fix * Cross-origin data leakage from script filename in error messages * Cross-domain data theft using CSS * Multiple location bar spoofing vulnerabilities * Characters mapped to U+FFFD in 8 bit encodings cause subsequent character to vanish * Same-origin bypass using canvas context * Cross-origin data disclosure via Web Workers and importScripts * Remote code execution using malformed PNG image * nsTreeSelection dangling pointer remote code execution vulnerability * nsCSSValue::Array index integer overflow * Arbitrary code execution using SJOW and fast native function * Plugin parameter EnsureCachedAttrParamArrays remote code execution vulnerability * Use-after-free error in NodeIterator * DOM attribute cloning remote code execution vulnerability * Miscellaneous memory safety hazards (rv:1.9.2.7/ 1.9.1.11)
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Version bump to new release which just increases hang detector timeout (http://www.mozilla.com/en-US/firefox/3.6.6/releasenotes/)
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: - Version bump to Firefox 3.6.4 - Firefox 3.6.4 provides uninterrupted browsing for users when there is a crash in plugins.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Add translate.pardus.org.tr to bookmarks toolbar by default.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Vergi kimlik no bookmark entry removed.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Bump to new security release (#12316): * XSS hazard using SVG document and binary Content-Type * XSS due to window.dialogArguments being readable cross-domain * Use-after-free crash in HTML parser * Web Worker Array Handling Heap Corruption Vulnerability * Crashes with evidence of memory corruption (rv:1.9.1.8/ 1.9.0.18)
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Remove ozgurlukicin.com from homepage and version bump to new stability release: * DNS resolution in MakeSN of nsAuthSSPI causing issues for proxy servers that support NTLM auth
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Depend strictly on new cairo and gtk2, fixes bug (#11724)
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Version bump to latest stable release and also fix Sabah newspaper and Calikbank(now Aktifbank) bookmark URIs.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Version bump to latest security release, #11473: * MFSA 2009-64 Crashes with evidence of memory corruption (rv:1.9.1.4/ 1.9.0.15) * MFSA 2009-63 Upgrade media libraries to fix memory safety bugs * MFSA 2009-62 Download filename spoofing with RTL override * MFSA 2009-61 Cross-origin data theft through document.getSelection() * MFSA 2009-59 Heap buffer overflow in string to number conversion * MFSA 2009-57 Chrome privilege escalation in XPCVariant::VariantDataToJS() * MFSA 2009-56 Heap buffer overflow in GIF color map parser * MFSA 2009-55 Crash in proxy auto-configuration regexp parsing * MFSA 2009-54 Crash with recursive web-worker calls * MFSA 2009-53 Local downloaded file tampering * MFSA 2009-52 Form history vulnerable to stealing
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Version bump to latest security release, CVE-2009-3070, #1114
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Fix Turkish translation of user word.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: * Images with ICC profiles now render properly on all monitors. * Several security issues: * Chrome privilege escalation due to incorrectly cached wrapper * Crashes with evidence of memory corruption (rv:1.9.1.2/1.9.0.13) * Location bar and SSL indicator spoofing via window.open() on invalid URL * Data corruption with SOCKS5 reply containing DNS name longer than 15 characters
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Remove LD_PRELOAD hack for Flash fullscreen crash bug, now it's fixed in xulrunner via a jemalloc patch.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Do not remove main Firefox directory in postRemove, it's very dangerous while using delta.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Version bump to latest bugfix release.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Bump to 3.5 final release and remove redundant /etc/env.d/10MozillaFirefox file.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Install application icon from Mozilla tarball instead of the additional file.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Do not strip debug symbols, we need them in our debug packages.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Version bump to 3.5rc1 release and add LD_PRELOAD hack for fullscreen video crashes with nvidia cards.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Move spellchecking related stuff including zemberek patch to xulrunner
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Version bump to new security release and make Firefox xulrunner dependant
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Version bump to new security release fixes CVE-2009-1044 and CVE-2009-1169
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: With new zemberek patch, firefox now uses zemberek-server via DBus instead of socket, thanks to Faiksan. Fixes #4385.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Security patches for mozilla#448329 and mozilla#456757.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Version bump to new security release
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Disable smooth scrolling as it slows down scrolling on low end computers and bad web sites.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Security patches for mozilla#448329 and mozilla#456757.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Version bump to new security release
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Fallback to English bookmarks in pt_BR locale
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: * Comment and GenericName keys are updated in desktop file. * network.prefetch-next enabled as in default. * German bookmarks added by Mustafa Ölçerman * Use system hunspell instead of the bundled one * about:about URI removed as upstream suggested.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Fix a translation bug in CTRL+F toolbar.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Don't show about:rights if the user has already accepted EULA.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: - Fixes the issue of missing mozilla plugins when KDE restores firefox upon logout (Fixes #7592), - Add ozgurlukicin.com as well as pardus.org.tr to the startup pages (Fixes #7172), - Fix several bugs in Turkish bookmarks and update some icons (Fixes #7987), - Fix several Turkish translation issues, - Remove EULA and add popup toolbar for showing user rights. - Use system sqlite instead of the one comes with Firefox
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Fix Turkish translation of Find in Edit menu
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Version bump to fresh bugfix release
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Version bump to 3.0.2 to fix severeal security issues
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Fix font problems, do not set fixed and minimum font sizes to 12, 15 is OK for most of the web sites. Set serif type as DejaVu Serif, not DejaVu Sans.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Version bump from rc1 to stable release
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Version bump, pl and ca locales added
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Some patches from SuSE and Ubuntu about reloading new plugins, default browser and no update
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Fix slowdown on spellchecking large editboxes
Update.Name: Mehmet D. Akın

Update.Comment: Fix a problem with Turkish translation
Update.Name: İsmail Dönmez

Update.Comment: Generate .autoreg file while installing to fix #5006 and similar problems
Update.Name: İsmail Dönmez

Update.Comment: Stable update to fix multiple vulnerabilities
Update.Name: İsmail Dönmez

Update.Comment: Enable shared libs as Furkan requested
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Re-enable visibility, it works on i386
Update.Name: İsmail Dönmez

Update.Comment: Version bump to fix various security bugs
Update.Name: İsmail Dönmez

Update.Comment: Version bump for several sec. fix, fix #2458 and add ~22 language to firefox
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Fix #382, #1305, #2432. Remove hacky wrapper which means faster startup times, update preload file. Fix printing issues from upstream. Update some additional files
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Revert back min. font size to 12pt
Update.Name: İsmail Dönmez

Update.Comment: Use system nss/nspr and fix upstream bug #305970
Update.Name: İsmail Dönmez

Update.Comment: Fix small font problems by always using X's dpi
Update.Name: İsmail Dönmez

Update.Comment: Update to version 1.5rc3, fix GTK+ 2.8 support and enable SVG
Update.Name: İsmail Dönmez
